title: Spiritual Unity
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>....and that’s how you should breathe. Now, continue to be mindful of your breathing and try to achieve spiritual unity, Rina....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Okay. *Inhale*.... *Exhale*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>How was your experience trying out spiritual unification?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hmm.... I’m not really sure, but there were times where my mind went blank.... At those times.... the image of the lyrics.... came to me.... I think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Fufu, that’s great. Keep it up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>If I continue this, do you think I’ll be able to.... write lyrics like yours, Umi-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I think it’s better if you continue to write as you would, Rina. Besides, I love your straightforward and honest lyrics.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Umi-san.... I love you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eeeeeeh!? Umm, I’m honored! I like you as well, and not just for your lyrics!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I love you....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
